doc.title: Inju kyoshi 3
doc.plot: Revenge is easy, especially when you've got someone else to do your dirty work. Unfortunately, bitter young college student Hiromi learns that getting rid of your enemies the old fashioned way can be a hard habit to break, especially when your partner in crime is a monster with an insatiable lust for human flesh. Viciously abused by a gang of malevolent young women, Hiromi turns the tables on her tormentors by luring her adversaries into the lair of the resurrected Professor Shimazakiy, whose death by impalement and burning in Angel of Darkness II seems to have been only a minor setback to his evil ambitions, will she sacrifice the life of her fellow student Minako? The ultimate in sexual horror unfolds in the most nightmarish dark fantasy every. Please note that while this video is 'uncensored', it is not 'uncut'. The most graphic sequences in this title have been removed from all US versions by the translating/distribution company.
